description: Retrieves a list of funding transactions, providing details and information about the transactions related to funding activities.

queryParameters.name: transaction_type
queryParameters.description: Specifies the type of the funding operation, whether it is "DEPOSIT" or "WITHDRAWAL".

queryParameters.name: page_number
queryParameters.description: Specifies the page number from which the request will start.

queryParameters.name: page_size
queryParameters.description: Specifies the number of items displayed per page in the paginated result.

queryParameters.name: date_from
queryParameters.description: Formats Accepts: ["YYYY-MM-DD", "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS"], The maximum interval is 60 days, depending on the date_to value.

pathParameters.name: user_id
pathParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company.

description: Initiates an on-chain withdrawal transaction from the specified address ID. The address must be registered as an origin address for withdrawal requests.

pathParameters.name: user_id
pathParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company.

description: Retrieves a list of funding transactions, providing details and information about the transactions related to funding activities.

queryParameters.name: funding_id
queryParameters.description: The identifier of the funding operation.

queryParameters.name: transaction_type
queryParameters.description: Specifies the type of the funding, whether it is a "WITHDRAW" or a "DEPOSIT".

queryParameters.name: status
queryParameters.description: Specifies the status of the funding.

queryParameters.name: state
queryParameters.description: Indicates the current state of the funding activity. A ‘PENDING’ state signifies that the funding process is ongoing and hasn’t reached a final status. In contrast, a ‘COMPLETED’ state indicates that the funding has concluded, with the final status denoting either success or failure

queryParameters.name: user_id
queryParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company.

queryParameters.name: page_number
queryParameters.description: Specifies the page number from which the request will start.

queryParameters.name: page_size
queryParameters.description: Specifies the number of items displayed per page in the paginated result.

queryParameters.name: date_from
queryParameters.description: Formats Accepts: ["YYYY-MM-DD", "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS"], The maximum interval is 30 days, depending on the date_to value.

pathParameters.name: funding_id
pathParameters.description: Specifies the identifier of the funding operation.

pathParameters.description: Specifies the identifier of the funding operation.
